fields.name: draft
fields.label: Draft
fields.description: No indicator. Always leave at false.

fields.name: author
fields.label: Author
fields.description: Leaving it blank will default to "Carl Gaspar".

fields.name: subtitle
fields.label: Subtitle
fields.description: Text below the title. Shown in the post. Don't put period at the end.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: Text below the subtitle on the posts page. Does not show in the post.

fields.name: date
fields.label: Date
fields.description: Not putting date will default to "Mon, Jan 1, 0001".

fields.name: header_img
fields.label: Header_img
fields.description: Leave it blank, "/img/home-bg.jpg" or custom image.

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
